mapper.sql: LEFT JOIN `organization_attribute` pa ON (pa.`object_id` = e.`object_id` AND pa.`attribute_type_id` = ${additionalParams.parentAT} AND pa.`status` = 'ACTIVE') LEFT JOIN `organization` p ON (p.`object_id` = pa.`value_id` AND p.`status` IN ('ACTIVE', 'INACTIVE')) LEFT JOIN `organization_attribute` p_name ON (p_name.`object_id` = p.`object_id` AND p_name.`attribute_type_id` = ${additionalParams.organizationShortNameAT} AND p_name.`status` = 'ACTIVE') LEFT JOIN `organization_string_culture` pn ON (pn.`id` = p_name.`value_id` AND pn.`locale_id` = ${localeId}) LEFT JOIN `organization_string_culture` pn_sys ON (pn_sys.`id` = p_name.`value_id` AND pn_sys.`locale_id` = (SELECT `id` FROM `locales` WHERE `system` = 1))

sql.if: AND (pn.`value` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{additionalParams.parentShortName}, '%') OR pn_sys.`value` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{additionalParams.parentShortName}, '%'))

mapper.select:
SELECT e.*, IFNULL(pn.`value`, pn_sys.`value`) `parent_short_name` FROM `organization` e
WHERE
